title: 服务器在正常过程中突然崩溃..
author: uiopjklkk
txt_content:
如题..昨天还好好的 今天我开放了一个新的世界并且在里面做好副本后 实测发现只要在这个新的世界里刷怪就会崩服 崩服后的logs显示为：[07:52:28] [Server thread/ERROR]: Encountered an unexpected exceptionjava.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.HashMap$HashIterator.nextNode(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_151]
        at java.util.HashMap$KeyIterator.next(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_151]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_9_R2.EntityTracker.updatePlayers(EntityTracker.java:176) ~[minecraft_server.jar:git-Spigot-8a048fe-d8637df]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_9_R2.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:814) ~[minecraft_server.jar:git-Spigot-8a048fe-d8637df]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_9_R2.DedicatedServer.D(DedicatedServer.java:399) ~[minecraft_server.jar:git-Spigot-8a048fe-d8637df]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_9_R2.MinecraftServer.C(MinecraftServer.java:665) ~[minecraft_server.jar:git-Spigot-8a048fe-d8637df]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_9_R2.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:564) [minecraft_server.jar:git-Spigot-8a048fe-d8637df]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_151]
[07:52:28] [Server thread/ERROR]: This crash report has been saved to: D:\服务端\.\crash-reports\crash-2019-08-22_07.52.28-server.txt
顺便附上崩服的错误文件..
求大佬佬紧急支援！ 急！
服务器端为1.9.4的原版spigot

replies.author: ColorsWind

单纯从报错上看觉得这应该是一个服务端的bug
建议你考虑更新你的服务端版本

或者使用paper
